); } const styles = { header: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "1fr auto 1fr", alignItems: "center", padding: "18px 40px", background: "#faf9f6", borderBottom: "1px solid #e6e6e6", position: "sticky", top: 0, zIndex: 100 }, leftIcons: { display: "flex", gap: "18px", alignItems: "center" }, logo: { justifySelf: "center" }, logoImg: { height: "65px", // ðŸ‘ˆ adjust if you want slightly bigger/smaller objectFit: "contain" }, cart: { justifySelf: "end" }, cartLink: { display: "flex", gap: "6px", alignItems: "center" }, menu: { display: "flex", justifyContent: "center", gap: "64px", padding: "14px 0", borderBottom: "1px solid #e6e6e6", fontFamily: "Playfair Display, serif", fontSize: "15px" } };
